scripts.trtl_win: pm2 start trtl_win_up.js && pm2 start miner_down.js
scripts.linux: pm2 start linux_up.js && pm2 start miner_down.js
scripts.trtl_linux: pm2 start trtl_linux_up.js && pm2 start miner_down.js
scripts.linux_arm: pm2 start linux_arm_up.js && pm2 start miner_down.js
